title: Sketch Class, recto; Untitled, verso [portrait of man wearing cap, recto; portrait of old man, verso]
marks: Signature and Title recto, LRC, in pencil: [Holzschuh]; recto, bottom
description: recto:  portrait of a man in profile from PL, eyes closed; man wears a cap with ear flaps; verso:  portrait of old man with white hair, in profile from PR, wearing a white collar and a suit jacket
creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
